name: LowerStr
shortDescription: convert all characters in a string to lower case
functionDocs:
Converts all characters in `string$` to lower case and returns the new string.

The optional `encoding` parameter can be used to set the character encoding to use. This defaults to the default string encoding set using [SetDefaultEncoding()](https://www.hollywood-mal.com/docs/html/hollywood/SetDefaultEncoding.html). See [Character encodings](https://www.hollywood-mal.com/docs/html/hollywood/CharacterEncoding.html) for details.
inputsDocs:
* `string$` — string to convert
* `encoding` — *optional:* character encoding to use (defaults to default string encoding) (V7.0)
example:
```
test$ = LowerStr("Hello World!")
Print(test$)
```

This will print "hello world!" to the screen.

name: UpperStr
functionDocs:
Converts all characters in `string$` to upper case.

The optional `encoding` parameter can be used to set the character encoding to use. This defaults to the default string encoding set using [SetDefaultEncoding()](https://www.hollywood-mal.com/docs/html/hollywood/SetDefaultEncoding.html). See [Character encodings](https://www.hollywood-mal.com/docs/html/hollywood/CharacterEncoding.html) for details.
inputsDocs:
`string$` — string to convert to upper case
* `encoding` — *optional:* character encoding to use (defaults to default string encoding) (V7.0)
example:
```
Print(UpperStr("Hello World!"))
```

Prints "HELLO WORLD!" to the screen.
